name: Point-E
description: This instrument is also a product of OpenAI. Point-E uses prompts to assist users in creating 3D models. To provide results, it combines the “text to images” and “images to 3D model” algorithms. A 3D model with coordinates that you may rotate and reorient in the 3D coordinate system is included in the final results. There are no registration or login requirements to utilize Point-E.
